pageProduct.name: Olay Moisturising Lotion 150ml Twin Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Olay Moisturising Lotion for hydrated, youthful skin is non-greasy and suitable for all skin types (normal/dry/oily/combination).

Olay's Famous Pink Lotion

Olay's moisturising lotion helps restore and maintain firm, youthful looking skin.

Its formula is:

- Suitable for all skin types (normal/dry/oily/combination).

- Fast absorbing.

- Non-greasy.

Results

Olay's moisturising lotion is formulated with glycerin, coconut oil and castor seed oil. In laboratory testing, it has shown to significantly:-

- Boost skin hydration.

- Increase skin suppleness and firmness.

- Improve skin smoothness.

Size: 2 x 150mL

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily| Sensitive

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Sorbitan Stearate, Dimethicone, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Cetyl Ricinoleate, Dimethiconol, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sucrose Cocoate, Methylparaben, Glyceryl Hydroxystearate, Fragrance, Stearic Acid, Steareth-100, Disodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, CI 17200.

Directions

Smooth on twice per day onto face and neck.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
